experiences.title: Learning Specialist
experiences.subtitle: Foundever
workDescription: Accountable for training, onboarding, and upskilling 150 CSR/product specialists for a medical company specialising in diabetes devices on their helpline.
Serve as the senior trainer for four distinct lines of business across Europe as I have the widest range of technological knowledge.

experiences.title: Mechanical Engineer
experiences.subtitle: AP Diesels
workDescription: In my role as a mechanical engineer, I excelled in the reconditioning of diesel injectors, ensuring punctual delivery and meeting stringent quality standards. This position required robust self-management skills, as I was solely responsible for ensuring orders were fulfilled on time.

experiences.title: Lead Barista
experiences.subtitle: Artizian Catering
workDescription: As the lead Barista, I managed site allegiance and oversaw operations in the manager's absence, demonstrating leadership and accountability.
